segments.text: Do you get the news that our company is trying to find out new tactics to test us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know something about it . Our company often organizes all kinds of lectures to improve our professional skills .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It takes most of our weekends to listen to these boring lectures , so I can not bear it anymore . It is said that they think out some tests to check our management skills .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If that information is exact , I guess our company is willing to promote someone .
segments.speaker: S2
